attributes.action: Make Cambridge university  lift ban on displaying remembrance Poppy’s.
attributes.background: For a worldly institution to ban a national symbol of remembrance for those who gave their all should be an individuals choice & university's obligation to display their respect, without those who sacrificed everything the university may not be here today.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for Cambridge University and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to know that Cambridge University Students Union have denied banning poppies:

https://www.cusu.co.uk/2018/10/17/no-we-did-not-ban-poppies-or-remembrance-day-at-cambridge-university/
